title: pd_client tests fail occassionary
body:
## Bug Report

https://ci.pingcap.net/blue/organizations/jenkins/tikv_ghpr_test/detail/tikv_ghpr_test/32226/tests/
```
thread 'cases::test_pd_client::test_backoff' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: Other("[components/pd_client/src/client_v2.rs:311]: Connection unavailable GRPC_CHANNEL_TRANSIENT_FAILURE")', tests/failpoints/cases/test_pd_client.rs:178:37
stack backtrace:
   0: rust_begin_unwind
             at /rustc/96ddd32c4bfb1d78f0cd03eb068b1710a8cebeef/library/std/src/panicking.rs:575:5
   1: core::panicking::panic_fmt
             at /rustc/96ddd32c4bfb1d78f0cd03eb068b1710a8cebeef/library/core/src/panicking.rs:65:14
   2: core::result::unwrap_failed
             at /rustc/96ddd32c4bfb1d78f0cd03eb068b1710a8cebeef/library/core/src/result.rs:1791:5
   3: core::result::Result<T,E>::unwrap
   4: failpoints::cases::test_pd_client::test_backoff::{{closure}}
             at /home/jenkins/tikv-src/tests/failpoints/cases/test_pd_client.rs:178:9

             at /home/jenkins/tikv-src/tests/failpoints/cases/test_pd_client.rs:151:5

             at /home/jenkins/tikv-src/tests/failpoints/cases/test_pd_client.rs:156:19
   8: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once
             at /rustc/96ddd32c4bfb1d78f0cd03eb068b1710a8cebeef/library/core/src/ops/function.rs:513:5
   9: test_util::runner::run_test_with_hook::{{closure}}::{{closure}}
  10: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}
  11: <alloc::boxed::Box<F,A> as core::ops::function::FnOnce<Args>>::call_once
             at /rustc/96ddd32c4bfb1d78f0cd03eb068b1710a8cebeef/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2000:9

running 1 test
test cases::test_pd_client::test_backoff ... FAILED
```
